trends: There have been no other sightings in Oak Hill
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsSighting Report: It was 1999, myself and my wife were traveling back to West Virginia from Ohio. Around Ravenswood WV at about 1:30 am I happened to look out the window of the car and I noticed a strange set of lights in the sky. There were approximately 7 to 8 lights in a horizontal row they ranged in color from blue, green, orange, pink, red, purple and other various colors. the object wasn t moving. I looked back at the road and when I did there was a bright flash of neon blue light, it reminded me of lighting. When i looked back up the object was gone but in its place was what looked like a tear in the sky that was a neon blue, and it slowly shrank away til it vanished. I woke my wife up who had been asleep and told her I had just seen a UFO, all she said was i was crazy. I still think to this day that what I saw that night was a UFO.
